original_title: Ang Panagtagbo sa Akong mga Apohan
overview: A glimpse of the history of an old religion called the Equifrilibricum World Religion, also known as the Moncadista. The filmmaker interviews her grandmother and the elder women members, shedding light to the once obscure religion and at the same time underscoring the mystery behind their faith.
title: The Day My Grandmothers Met
